text: Lloyd Alton Doggett II (born October 6, 1946) is an American attorney and politician. He is a U.S. representative from Texas from 1995 to 2023. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Doggett was the only Democrat to represent any part of Austin in Congress. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Politicians from Austin, Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Austin Category:Members of the Texas Legislature
title: Lloyd Doggett
